scripts.clean: concurrently -i -c green,blue -n core,react 'cd core && npm run clean' 'cd react && npm run clean'
scripts.predev: cd core && npm run build:dev && cd ../react && npm run build:dev
scripts.dev: concurrently -i -c green,blue,yellow -n core,react,react-example 'cd core && npm run build:watch' 'cd react && npm run build:watch' 'cd react-example && npm run dev'
scripts.docker: cd core && npm run build && cd ../react && npm run build:docker && cd ../react-example && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.build: npm run clean && cd core && npm run build && cd ../react && npm run build
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cd core && npm run build:staging && cd ../react && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:staging: npm run clean && cd core && npm run build:staging && cd ../react && npm run build:staging
scripts.build:github-action: npm run clean && cd core && npm run build:github-action && cd ../react && npm run build:github-action
scripts.check: concurrently -i -c green,blue -n eslint,prettier 'npm run lint' 'npm run prettier'
scripts.version: concurrently -i -c green,blue,yellow -n core,react,react-example 'cd core && npm version $VERSION' 'cd react && npm version $VERSION' 'cd react-example && npm version $VERSION'
